Johannes Brahms

Variations and Fugue on a Theme by Handel, op. 24

1861

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The theme, the aria from George Frideric Handel’s suite in B-flat major (HWV 434), is followed by twenty-five variations and a fugue.

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/5 [in preparation]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9607 · ed. Christian Köhn
  • Henle · HN 440 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Margit McCorkle / Sonja Gerlach / Hans Kann / Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 272 · ed. Sonja Gerlach
  • Könemann · K 115 · Variationen · ed. Enikő Gyenge
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50171 · ed. Johannes Behr

Duration: 26' 30"

Difficulty: 5
